title: Igor Stravinsky
creator_credit: Robert Graff, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and National Broadcasting Company
brief_description: Stravinsky talks of his life and work with his young American associate, the conductor Robert Craft. They discuss the half century of creative effort in which Stravinsky has been a daring explorer of new forms in music.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Graff, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and National Broadcasting Company
